Annotation_Schema_TAZ_v1.2.TEXT: [s0] Travis: All right, I have an idea, fellas. [s1] Go with - Go with me on this. [s2] [noise of soda can opening] [s3] Griffin: Okay. [s4] Magnus: Roswell. [s308] The-the three of you are the only three of you that there are, doing the things that the three of you do here in this world.
